name: PiratesBattle
description:
Only one crew or fleet can win the Pirates Battle !

Survive and defeat your enemies in "the sea of the storm" , Gather ressources to keep your ship in a good condition , equipe cannons , Sails , hulls , always look for the cannon balls , unless you want to ram them , get new special ability for your ship !

Upgrade your ship depending on your battle style ! , you want a maneuverable fast ship ? find a low level ship hull and a high level sails ! , you want a powerfull and durable ship ? get high level ship hull .

Corporate with other crews in the fleet to win the battle , take controle of the islands for a vision in the area , survive and defeat the legendery monsters of the sea ! , and most importantly stay out of the Storm !

Win battles to rank up  and  earn Pirates Coins to buy Many ship Cosmetics , Emotes , animations and more !
